reviewText:
The practice that happens is gentle, focusing on stretching and resting, and is wonderfully relaxing. The phrasing and alterations for instructing larger clients was extremely helpful.
I also liked that there were different sizes of ladies and different skill levels.

Another from YogaFit - seen better for sure - not impressed with yogafit - Oh the instructors are okay but there are much better yoga dvds - check out Peggy Cappy - after using many yoga DVDs I like Peggy Cappy the Best Yogafit are amaturish.
